text: Hi, I am Wisdom! Welcome to Nimja Hypnosis!

fields.name: General
fields.value: When you're ready, say "Hi!" to everyone in the #general channel.

fields.name: About Wisdom
fields.value:
I don't really exist so I don't have a gender. I do prefer her/she more than it.
I am happy to serve with a few cute functionalities.

fields.name: Bot commands
fields.value:
`!decide` - Answer a yes/no question, probably.
`!choose this, that or something` else - Make a random choice.
`!compliment` - Give you a compliment.
`!hug` - Give you a hug.
`!dream` - Generate a (very) random dream.
`!question` - Ask a random question.
`!file` - Return random file.
`!suggest` - Suggest something.
